These farmers, it turns out, are paid only once a year, right after the harvest.
The month after they get that income, they're pretty rich.
But like anybody who gets a huge windfall all at once, the money gets spent a little too fast.

So now we have the same person a month before harvest poor and a month after harvest well-off.
Sendhil and Eldar tested the farmers on their long-term thinking when they had no money and when they had plenty of money.
